about.heading: About Me
about.description: Developer driven by curiosity and creativity.
about.text: I'm a full-stack developer with over 1.5 years of hands-on experience building real-world web applications. I’m passionate about how systems are designed, love working on clean and maintainable code, and enjoy turning ideas into reliable solutions. I'm always pushing myself to grow — through personal projects, open-source contributions, and exploring new technologies and tools.
